mapper.insert: insert into Subject (SubjectCate_no, SubjectName, Outline, Delstatus ) values (#{SubjectCate_no}, #{SubjectName}, #{Outline}, 0)
mapper.select: select SubjectCate_no, CateName, ParentCode from SubjectCate where Delstatus=0
select Subject_no, SubjectCate_no, SubjectName, Outline from Subject where Delstatus=0
select SubjectCate_no from SubjectCate where SubjectCate_no NOT IN (select sc.SubjectCate_no from SubjectCate sc, SubjectCate sc2 where sc.SubjectCate_no=sc2.ParentCode group by sc.SubjectCate_no)
select SubjectCate_no, CateName from SubjectCate where SubjectCate_no=#{no}
select Subject_no, SubjectCate_no, SubjectName, Outline from Subject where Subject_no=#{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE Subject set Delstatus =1 where Subject_no=#{no}
UPDATE Subject set Delstatus =1 where SubjectCate_no=#{pid}
UPDATE SubjectCate set Delstatus =1 where SubjectCate_no=#{id}
UPDATE Subject set Delstatus =1 where Parent=#{pid}
